EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_The Insiders Guide to Mobile Apps_Q115.Correction Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Correction: Updated Login for The Insider's Guide to Mobile Apps Webinar on 1/7
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar "The Insider's Guide to Mobile Apps" on Wednesday, January 7, 2015 at 10:00 AM PST. We have updated the event with corrected login information. Please re-save the .ics file or refresh your calendar hold with the new login link <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=916159&s=1&k=87114DD4CABA4D534C05B46D65FB252C>. Let us know if you have any questions!
Date: Wednesday, January 7, 2015 Time: 10:00AM PST (San Francisco) Join the Session <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=916159&s=1&k=87114DD4CABA4D534C05B46D65FB252C> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via audio bridge
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us, The Pivotal Team
